name: Go Go Goblin Mode
description:
Go Go Goblin Mode is a split-screen, local co-op platformer where you and a friend play as two goblins that got a little too curious and opened up a beast of horror that chases them out of its tower. One goblin uses their bombs to destroy terrain and rocket jump up platforms. The other has the power to grow and shrink, squeezing through gaps and punching through obstacles.

But beware...

"The End" is chasing you. Do not delay, and hurry up! You must escape the dungeons and get the loot before time runs out, and "The End" catches up...

Help your gobo friend by stepping on pressures plates, and pressing buttons to open up pathways for your friend to ascend the tower and escape the horror that approaches from the depths.

-- TWO PLAYER ONLY -- Solve puzzles, and unlock your paths to Victory! Lend a helping hand, or bomb! Throw your friend to greater heights!
Time your inputs for maximum velocity! Go big, go small, go Goblin Mode Use explosives as a multipurpose tool of destruction Unleash the beast and wreck your surroundings!
CONTROLS

//Player 1 is on the Keyboard, Player 2 is on Controller

Blue Goblin - Controller

JUMP: A

SHRINK: X

GROW: B

INTERACT: Y

MOVE: L-STICK

ZOOM OUT: L-CLICK

PAUSE: START BUTTON

Green Goblin - Keyboard

JUMP: SPACEBAR

TIMED BOMB: F

INSTANT BOMB: R

INTERACT: E

MOVE: WASD

ZOOM OUT: Q

PAUSE: ESCAPE

Assets

- Fire and Smoke VFX from Infinity Blade: Effects by Epic Games

- Goblin character models from 'Enemy Goblin' by Lilpupinduy

- Fire VFX from Low Poly Medieval Interior and Constructions by Polyart 3D

All other assets were made by our team members!

Game Jam

This game was made in 72 hours and submitted to the Winter Jam 2023 by r/Solodevelopment. The theme was "The End is Near", which we incorporated by having an entity called "The End" chase players through the dungeons of the game; always near, looming, and threatening players with defeat. To escape, players most collaborate with their unique abilities: bombs, and growth!
